title: Announcing the 2024 HashiCorp Partner of the Year Award winners
content:
Today at HashiCorp’s annual conference, HashiConf, we announced the recipients of the 2024 HashiCorp Partner of the Year Awards. We honor two critical partner award areas annually, System Integrators and Technology Partners.

The System Integrator Awards honor top-performing partners that have demonstrated excellence in sales and services for HashiCorp solutions. They celebrate our partners’ commitment to helping enterprises accelerate their cloud adoption journeys. Each of these winners has delivered significant technology capabilities relating to the HashiCorp portfolio, assisted with growing the capabilities of HashiCorp’s products, and consistently delivered value to our joint customers through services and innovation initiatives. Systems Integrators (SIs) enable our customers to do cloud right with the HashiCorp Infrastructure Cloud, a unified platform for their entire digital estate. This helps them to manage the full lifecycle of their infrastructure and security resources and make the most of their cloud investment.

The Technology Partner Awards celebrate HashiCorp technology partners who have built and expanded ecosystem solutions for customers through new integrations, co-engineered solutions, and participated in joint marketing initiatives. Our ecosystem partners are foundational to the success of HashiCorp, and we are thrilled to recognize their extensive contributions.

AMER SI Partner of the Year

River Point Technology

We are happy to announce River Point Technology (RPT), known for delivering award-winning IT consulting, training, and year-round enablement solutions that accelerate digital transformation, as our AMER SI Partner of the Year. River Point Technology’s unique approach is based on their proprietary and proven Value Creation Technology (VCT) process that empowers IT teams to confidently take strategic risks that result in measurable business impact. This award recognizes River Point Technology as one of the few partners holding all three core competencies — infrastructure, security, and networking — and how they play a critical role in testing and piloting new products and features, reflecting their proactive involvement in innovation.

APJ SI Partner of the Year

Versent

Versent is a leading technology consultancy that exists to architect, build, and operate cloud-native applications, data streams, platforms, and services. Versent works with customers to transform their businesses through technology in ways they never imagined, harnessing the deep expertise of 600 Versentonians. Through innovative use of our commercial products, Versent has developed repeatable offerings that have enabled large enterprises to overcome stalled cloud transformation projects, future-proof digital applications, and build multi-cloud factories. Their ability to create future-ready DevSecOps platforms and deliver on a wide range of customer needs makes them a standout partner, deserving of this recognition as our APJ RSI Partner of the Year.

EMEA SI Partner of the Year

GlobalLogic Corp UK LTD

GlobalLogic, a Hitachi Group Company, is a trusted digital engineering partner to the world’s largest and most forward-thinking companies. Since 2000, they’ve been at the forefront of the digital revolution — helping create some of the most innovative and widely used digital products and experiences. Today GlobalLogic continues to collaborate with clients in transforming businesses and redefining industries through intelligent products, platforms, and services. HashiCorp is happy to recognize GlobalLogic as this year’s EMEA SI Partner of the Year for their ability to drive customer success and leverage our technologies to solve complex challenges.

Technology Partner of the Year

Datadog

We are pleased to announce Datadog, a leading observability partner who brings together data from servers, clouds, metrics and apps, as our Technology Partner of the Year for 2024. This award recognizes Datadog’s willingness to proactively collaborate on co-marketing initiatives including blogs, webinars, and workshops and deliver customer value through integrations across the HashiCorp product set, including the HCP platform, HCP Terraform, HCP Vault, HCP Consul, HCP Boundary, and HCP Packer.

Collaboration Partner of the Year

Palo Alto Networks

The Collaboration Partner of the Year Award highlights the technology partner that has proactively engaged with HashiCorp for joint engineering and joint marketing opportunities. We are pleased to announce Palo Alto Networks, a leading multi-cloud security provider, as this year’s winner. Palo Alto Networks has prioritized extensive collaboration such as proactive inclusion in happy hour events, partner-hosted webinars, multiple blog posts, workshops, and regional events across the world.

Integration Partner of the Year

Coder

Coder, the provider of an enterprise tool to configure, secure, and manage software development environments, has built multiple integrations with HashiCorp products over the last 12 months. Integrations with HCP Vault Secrets, HCP Vault, and HashiCorp Nomad have earned Coder the Integration Partner of the Year.

Emerging Partner of the Year

JetBrains

Highlighting a new partner that has worked with HashiCorp for less than a year but has produced the most cross-product integrations, the Emerging Partner of the Year award goes to JetBrains, a global software company specializing in the creation of intelligent tools for software developers and teams. Since joining HashiCorp’s partner program, JetBrains has delivered integrations for HCP Vault and Terraform and has worked collaboratively on new solutions.

Explore the HashiCorp Partner Network

We want to thank our winners and our entire partner network for all the work they do to help support the larger HashiCorp ecosystem and our joint customers. To learn more about the HashiCorp Partner Network, visit our Partners page.
author: Jaclyn Wood
